question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [take off and view nearby stone flower pot. then go straight to view trees. then go straight and turn left to view the traffic lights on the road. then go straight and view the single tree near by water area then view water area from the top of the tree. then turn left to view the chimney on the highest building and view the all over buildings from top. then turn left and go straight to view the tree between the two buildings. then go straight to view the american advertisement board.]. At the initial position, you are asked to navigate according to a series of movement instructions. What Landmark Position are you oriented to the sea when you arrive at the current location?  
choose:  
A. I am located on the left side of the sea.  
B. I am located under the sea.  
C. I am located on the right side of the sea.  
D. The sea is behind me.  
E. I have no obvious positional relationship with the sea.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: C; Reason: The sequence of images shows that the agent moves through various landmarks and eventually reaches a position where the sea is visible on the right side. This is evident from the last few images where the sea is prominently on the right, indicating that the agent is oriented to the right side of the sea at the current location.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0:47, 1:02), (1:39, 1:57)]
Option: []
Reason: From 0:47 to 1:02, the video shows the agent turning left to view the chimney on the highest building and view the all over buildings from top. From 1:39 to 1:57, the video shows the agent turning left and going straight to view the tree between the two buildings, then going straight to view the american advertisement board. At the end of the video, the sea is on the right side of the agent.
Location: [(1:39, 1:57)]
Option: [C]
Reason: From 1:39 to 1:57, the video shows the agent turning left and going straight to view the tree between the two buildings, then going straight to view the american advertisement board. At the end of the video, the sea is on the right side of the agent.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: C; Reason: The sequence of images shows that the agent moves through various landmarks and eventually reaches a position where the sea is visible on the right side. This is evident from the last few images where the sea is prominently on the right, indicating that the agent is oriented to the right side of the sea at the current location.
